name: Ascension (ascension-game)
description:
Ascension is a first-person ‘walking simulator’ with an emphasis on narrative, atmosphere, mystery and discovery.

Explore Vitafield, a pharmaceutical corporation, and the abandoned remnants of their underground facility where their research and experiments were conducted.

Controls: Mouse and keyboard only, WASD for movement, E to interact or close a narrative item, TAB to open inventory and quest menu.

Recommended Specification: 8gig RAM, i7 3.20GHz, GTX1050.

Software used: Unreal engine 4, Maya, Substance Designer, Substance Painter, Photoshop.
